Race.SpecificTitle: Lower Cameron Hospital Dist. No. 2 -- 6 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Lower Cameron Hospital Service District No. Two Proposition

Summary:  Authority for Lower Cameron Hospital Service District No. Two to collect, for 10 years, a tax of six mills per annum on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $438,000 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of this tax per annum) for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining health care facilities within and for said District.
Race.FullText: Shall Lower Cameron Hospital Service District No. Two of the Parish of Cameron, be authorized to levy a tax of six (6.00) mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation in said District, (an estimated $438,000 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of this tax annum) for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2010, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining said District's health care facilities, title to which shall be in the public within and for said District?
